short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove background noise during calls with Krisp for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Krisp gives you a superpower to muting all background noise (screaming kids, barking dogs, airport noise, etc) and join conference calls. So, you can work from anywhere you want without worrying about noise.

★ Speak without noise
With a single button, the background noise going from you to other call participants will be removed.

★ Supports any web conferencing app
Google Meet,  Webex, Talkdesk, Slack Web, Zoom Web, and more.

★ Works with any headset
Use any microphone and external headset with Krisp without limitations.

★ Powered by AI
The world’s best AI-powered noise-canceling technology adapts to your voice and improves over time.
